SENTENCE.STRING: (13,502 ft / 4,115 m) is located in the Wind River Range in the U.S. state of Wyoming.
is the ninth highest in the range and the tenth tallest in Wyoming.
The summit is located in the Bridger Wilderness of Bridger-Teton National Forest, immediately west of the Continental Divide.
The eastern and western flanks of
are covered in snowfields and glaciers, including Dinwoody Glacier to the northeast and Mammoth Glacier to the west.
